snippet.title: RetroBlazer - Official Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the Steam trailer for RetroBlazer, a colorful first-person shooter developed by Hydra Game Works. Fight against the cybernetic Ark Legion as a member of the Pyramid Guard to rid the kingdom of a spectral Blight. Dispatch waves of enemies through diverse locations and banish the Blight for good. RetroBlazer is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#RetroBlazer #Gaming #IGN
